Everybody have learned in the school that six million Jews died in the WWII.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Holocaust#Jewish

6-million Jews  is a kabbalistic number in Talmudic lore composed almost 900 years before WWII occurred.
In the Hebrew text of the Jewish Torah prophesies, one can read "you shall  return". In the text the letter "V" or "VAU" is absent. Because ancient Hebrew does not have numbers,  the letter V stands for the number 6.
The kabbalistic branch of Judaism interprets the texts of the Torah with secret meaning in relations with numbers. 
Number mysticism was very usual in the antic world and even now an entire school in Israel is learning this (science).
The prophecy then reads: You will return, but with 6 million less.
Jewish prophecies in the Torah are interpreted that the state of Israel can be formed only after 6 million Jews vanished.
(Ben Weintraub, religious scientist: "The Holocaust Dogma of Judaism", Cosmo Publishing, Washington 1995, page 3.,

Now I am coming with the second part of my explanation.
What it means holocaust?
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Holocaust
The Wikipedia, the biggest encyclopedia says:
'The Holocaust (from the Greek ὁλόκαυστος holókaustos: hólos, "whole" and kaustós, "burnt"),[3] also known as the Shoah (Hebrew: השואה, HaShoah, "the catastrophe"), was a genocide in which Adolf Hitler's Nazi Germany and its collaborators killed about six million Jews.'
This is the meaning today - Holocaust is the murdering of six million Jews in the WWII by Germans. 
It mentions also some former Greek meaning 'catastrophe with burning', which suggests that was the meaning maybe 2000 years ago. But it is not so.

Let us see the Encyclopedia Britannica 6th edition from 1823.
'HOLOCAUST (formed from "whole", and mttut, "I consume with fire)", a kind of sacrifice, wherein the whole offering is burnt or consumed by fire, as an acknowledgment that God, the creator, preserver, and lord of all, was worthy of all honour and worship, and as a token of men's giving themselv…'
As we see the former meaning of Holocaust was 'a sacrifice for God which need to be burnt by fire'.

We still need another element of the Talmudic logic of Judaism to understand how a sacrifice is valid. It is logic that it cannot be made by a Gentile who is just an animal. A sacrifice to the God of the Jews will be accepted by God only if it is made by a Jew.
Now let us traduce the prophecy from the Torah with the Talmudic interpretation which was given by learned rabbis more then 100 years before the WWII:

The state Israel can only be created again only when 6 million Jews will be sacrificed to God(by a Jew) by burning them on fire.
